name: Coin Quest (R41ndrop12)
description:
Who Am I?

I'm a new Unity Dev, this is my second Jam and my first rated Jam. I hope you like it and am open to criticism! Also, credits below...

Controls

WASD/Arrow keys to move and Space bar will be needed later. 

What is this game about?

This game a 6 level rage platformer. Collect the coins to unlock the portal. After beating the part one of the level, the level will rotate 180 degrees.  Every 2nd part of a level will have a secret room, fulfilling the extra challenge. 100% complete record is 2:30.

Helpful Tips:

Walking of the edge of the platform will keep your jump.

Sometimes running as far out before jumping is not the solution.

Also don't forget to
